header.headertext: AMENDMENTS AND MOTION TO BE MOVED ON CONSIDERATION OF COMMONS AMENDMENTS

text.quote: 000: After Clause 29, line 11, leave out from beginning to “, the” in line 24
000: After Clause 29, line 15, leave out subsections (3) and (4)
000: After Clause 29, line 6, at end insert “, and which limits aggregate annual charges to members in respect to membership and access to arbitration to 0.25% of the member’s annual turnover”
000: After Schedule 14, line 14, at end insert—
4A A person who publishes a title that—
text.IndentOne: (a) relates to countries outside the United Kingdom, and
(b) only contains United Kingdom news-related material on a subsidiary basis.
text.quote: 4B A person who has been refused membership of all approved regulators for any reason other than unwillingness or inability to comply with the rules of such regulators.”
000: Schedule 15, lord Ramsbotham to move, as an amendment to the motion that this House do agree with the Commons in their Amendment 133, leave out “agree” and insert “disagree”.
